name: Sensorium Galaxy
description:
Join with your friends to experience the next generation of Social VR.

Sensorium Galaxy is inviting early-stage beta testers to get the first look at PRISM – the ultimate domain for out-of-this-world experiencies and shows performed by some of the biggest stars in electronic music.

The transformative energy of PRISM is beginning to flow as Virtual DJs take the stage and create the relaxed lounge experience with the first-ever performances of AI generated electronic music.

Become part of the Sensorium Galaxy early adopter community and share your feedback to guide the development as we prepare for the arrival of guests and world-famous DJs.

Please note: early-stage beta offers limited functionality and does not represent the final look and feel.

Sensorium Galaxy is a cross-platform application that will be available in PC and VR modes. At this time, only VR mode is available for testing.

Features:

  • FIRST LOOK: next-generation Social VR Experience in the making.
  • FASHION FOR THE METAVERSE AGE: unique line of avatars with looks to rule the dancefloor.
  • CHOOSE YOUR STYLE: pick the look from the preset avatar skins. More customization options are coming soon.
  • FEEL THE CONNECTION: full body avatar system makes sure your movements appear natural and enables lipsync when you speak.
  • ENTER PRISM: explore the hyper-futuristic atmosphere of the electronic music world — the first in the Sensorium Galaxy metaverse.
  • TUNE TO VIRTUAL DJs: listen to upcoming stars of AI music perform groovy sets and generative beats.
  • MEET VIRTUAL BEINGS: strike up a conversation with AI-driven companions.
  • VR CONTROLS REDEFINED: experience VR movement in a new immersive way.
